overview: This 1991 film was the then nineteen year old director Daniel Erickson's first full length feature film. Producer Keith Brunson teamed up with co-producer/director/writer Erickson to bring his vision to life. They formed the production company Generic Movies LTD. to produce their one and only film. Filmed entirely in and around the Austin, Texas area.
tagline: Fear is a state of mind
title: Scary Movie
